overview: A comprehensive DevOps roadmap covering infrastructure automation, CI/CD, containerization, monitoring, and cloud-native technologies for modern software delivery.

steps.title: Linux System Administration
steps.description: Master Linux fundamentals, shell scripting, and system administration tasks.

steps.title: Version Control & Collaboration
steps.description: Advanced Git workflows and collaboration strategies for development teams.

steps.title: Infrastructure as Code
steps.description: Automate infrastructure provisioning and management using code-based approaches.

steps.title: Containerization & Orchestration
steps.description: Master Docker containers and Kubernetes orchestration for scalable applications.

steps.title: CI/CD Pipeline Design
steps.description: Design and implement robust continuous integration and deployment pipelines.
resources: Jenkins, GitHub Actions, or GitLab CI

steps.title: Cloud Platform Mastery
steps.description: Deep dive into major cloud platforms and their DevOps services.

steps.title: Monitoring & Observability
steps.description: Implement comprehensive monitoring, logging, and alerting systems.
resources: ELK Stack or Fluentd for logging

steps.title: Security & Compliance
steps.description: Integrate security practices throughout the DevOps lifecycle (DevSecOps).

steps.title: Performance & Scalability
steps.description: Optimize applications and infrastructure for performance and scale.
